data.oai_dc:dc: Genetic data used for the genetic analyses. Columns: year (1998 to 2012), bird ring (ID), sex (1 = male, 2 = female), immigrant status (1 = immigrant/born oustide the study area, 0 = resident/born inside the study area), V126I (MC1R, II = ho for the rufous allele, VI = he, VV = ho for the white allele), 10 microsatellites (diploid).
